channel.title: Client, Server and Design coders wanted for Ancientforums
channel.description: This is a recruitment thread not an advertisement If you think you should be in the Ancientforums design team, or the server coders or the client coders please fill in the form below and leave a message here. I will inform you if you receive your position and you can help the forums and client be the best it can be [code]Name: Email: Position: Reason: Experience(1/10)[/code] When you have left the post below i will PM you asap and let you know about the positon if you are fairly new to the scene but want to apply anyway make sure you ask moderators and admins for help as soon as you arrive at out forums

item.title: Client, Server and Design coders wanted for Ancientforums
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

This is a recruitment thread not an advertisement
If you think you should be in the Ancientforums design team, or the server coders or the client coders please fill in the form below and leave a message here. I will inform you if you receive your position and you can help the forums and client be the best it can be

Name: Email: Position: Reason: Experience(1/10)
When you have left the post below i will PM you asap and let you know about the positon if you are fairly new to the scene but want to apply anyway make sure you ask moderators and admins for help as soon as you arrive at out forums

Read full topic
item.source: Client, Server and Design coders wanted for Ancientforums
